bibl.title: Fish and Chits: The Synodontis Schall. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Textual sources and archaeological evidence for the Synodontis Schall, the commonest Nile fish (gr. xo›row) are reviewed. Tar€xion may be interpreted as pickled fish even in monastic sources. <choiros, tarichion>
CLACKSON Sarah J., Fish and Chits: The Synodontis Schall. Avec résumé en anglais.
